ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of KEN LANGILLE of New Glasgow, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
